exec forge config dump --pretty ./blueprint.cue
cmp stdout golden.txt

-- golden.txt --
{
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "ci": {
    "global": {
      "registry": "",
      "satellite": ""
    },
    "secrets": {},
    "targets": {
      "test": {
        "args": {},
        "privileged": true,
        "retries": 0,
        "secrets": []
      }
    }
  }
}
-- blueprint.cue --
version: "1.0"
ci: {
  targets: {
      test: {
          privileged: true
      }
  }
}
